item.title: Home
item.description: Beautiful documentation Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes. Material is very lightweight â€“ it is built from scratch using Javascript and CSS that weighs less than 30kb (minified, gzipped and excluding Google Fonts and Analytics). Yet, it is highly customizable and degrades gracefully in older browsers.

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Installation macOS brew install sweady Linux wget xxx && chmod +x Setup You must move to the folder where you want to manage the Sweady configuration. sweady init Configuration The previous step generates a sweady_config.json file that will contain all of the information needed to build your Sweady cluster. Once you have finished the configuration, you must run this command: sweady create

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: Quo vadis? The port of the original Material theme has replicated nearly all of its features. A few are still missing but I’ve good news: the Hugo community is actively working on this issues. Maybe with the next release of Hugo we can abandon this list. Stay tuned. Localization Currently, it is possible to collect all strings in a single place for easy customization. However, this only enables you to define all strings in a single language.
